review: I get better sound and picture with my Fire TV Stick than I get with my Verizon set top box.  Much more cost effective, also.
author: William B Fegley

review: I love this! It is beyond great.
author: Vickie

review: Works great!!  I was able to "cut the cable".  also, amazon customer service is really good for the most part...depending on  who you get  on their end to pick up the phone.
author: BB in LA "BB"

review: I ordered this for use at a Marriott extended stay and had concerns it would even work here, on their internet. It works like a champ!  Much faster than Roku by the way,  and comparable to Chromcast...  Fire is the best of both.
author: Comesitbymyfire

review: Very nice product. Worth every cent
author: James M

review: Instant access to all of my favorite streaming apps. Super simple set up, user friendly interface. Love love love it.
author: Alyssa Marie Orozco

review: The Add with Gary Busey made it seem like you could mirror your computer and you can't. It also is very intermittent even with a strong internet connection there is constant buffering.
author: Isaiah flynn

review: I have both the stick and the box.  Enjoy them both and am glad I purchased them, but the stick is wonderfully adequate for my needs.
author: gobraugh
